text:
uqBA vA#mindrAgnI AhuqvaddhyA# uqBA rAdha#saH saqha mA#daqyaddhyai$ |
uqBA dAqtArA#viqShA(gm) ra#yIqNAmuqBA vAja#sya sAqtayE# huvE vAM ||
aSra#vaq(gm)q hi BU#riqdAva#ttarA vAqM ~MvijA#mAturuqta vA# GA syAqlAt | 
athAq sOma#syaq praya#tI yuqvaByAqmindrA$gnIq stOma#M janayAmiq navya$M ||
indrA$gnI navaqtiM purO# dAqsapa#tnIradhUnutaM | sAqkamEkE#naq karma#NA ||
SuciqM nu stOmaqM nava#jAta-maqdyEndrA$gnI vRutrahaNA juqShEthA$M | 25
